author: The Guardian Nigeria
title: Ground News - Trinity University celebrates festive season with carol of seven lessons
text:
Summary by The Guardian Nigeria To celebrate the festive period, Trinity U okniversity, Yaba, Lagos, has marked the end of the year with song ministrations to spread goodwill and the love of Christ. The post Trinity University celebrates festive season with carol of seven lessons appeared first on The Guardian Nigeria News - Nigeria and World News. Share menu More
